title: Are You Listening? | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Are You Listening? | Joel Osteen
description:
God is always speaking, the question is, are we listening? When you let His voice guide you in everything you do, He will lead you down the right path for your life. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
